titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of May 2024 as "Mental Health Awareness Month".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of May 2024 as "Mental Health Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution declares mental health a national priority and supports the designation of May 2024 as Mental Health Awareness Month.
